snippet: Two Cisco Systems presidents are leaving the company as Chuck Robbins takes over as chief executive and moves to a “flatter” leadership team.
lead_paragraph: Two Cisco Systems presidents are leaving the company as Chuck Robbins takes over as chief executive and moves to a “flatter” leadership team.

headline.main: 2 Cisco Presidents Will Leave in a Restructuring
headline.print_headline: 2 Cisco Presidents Will Leave In a Restructuring
